movies.name: Blitz 007
movies.overview: A tough, renegade cop with a gay sidekick is dispatched to take down a serial killer who has been targeting police officers.

movies.name: Hostage
movies.overview: When a mafia accountant is taken hostage on his beat, a police officer must negotiate the standoff, even as his own family is held captive by the mob.

movies.name: Red Notice
movies.overview: The world's most wanted art thief and an FBI profiler must work together to catch a cunning criminal mastermind.

movies.name: Inception
movies.overview: A skilled thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology must plant an idea into a CEO's mind instead of stealing one.

movies.name: The Dark Knight
movies.overview: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests.
